iana.template_text:
(last updated 2002-06-24)

Date: Wed, 24 Sep 97 23:21:47 PDT
From: Dovid Lubin <dovid&acucorp.com>
To: iana&ISI.EDU, dovid&acucorp.com
Subject: Request for MIME media type Application/Vendor Tree - vnd.

Name : Dovid Lubin

E-mail : dovid&acucorp.com

MIME media type name : Application

MIME subtype name : Vendor Tree - vnd.acucobol

Required parameters : none

Optional parameters : 
none

Encoding considerations : 
ACU files are binary

Security considerations : 
ACU files are machine independent COBOL objects. When executed using
the ACUCOBOL-GT runtime, they have access to all of the local and
network resources that are allowed by the operating system for the
user. ACU files from an unknown source should never be considered as
trusted applications.

Interoperability considerations : 
ACU files are interpreted by the ACUCOBOL-GT runtime. The ACUCOBOL-GT
runtime is currently available on over 600 different platforms. It has
been ported to MS-DOS, 16 bit Windows, 32 bit Windows (95 and NT),
OS/2, Unix, VMS, AMOS, and AOS/VS operating systems.

Published specification : 
none

Applications which use this media : 
ACUCOBOL-GT Runtime

Additional information :

1. Magic number(s) : 0x10121420 and 0x10121421
2. File extension(s) : .acu
3. Macintosh file type code : none

Person to contact for further information :

1. Name : Dovid Lubin
2. E-mail : dovid&acucorp.com

Intended usage : Common 


Author/Change controller :  

Change History
--------------
2002-06-24
Updated all e-mail address from 
dovid&acucobol.com to dovid&acucorp.com.
